name: Fuzzites: Mini Adventure
description:
(VERY EARLY IN DEVELOPMENT)Story

You are traveling through the forest of Abonland, when you stumble upon a small creature in a clearing. At first it is a bit timid, but after you toss it an apple from a nearby tree it seems to have accepted you as a new friend. This must be a Fuzzite! Your older brother had told you many stories of running into them when traveling between the two major cities of Abonland. 

Try feeding it other fruits to see what happens. Take your Fuzzite to the pond to see if it can find you any treasures. Go to the races and see if your friend has what it takes to win 

Controls
  • Move your Hand - Mouse
  • Click and Drag Objects to Interact - Mouse
How to Play

Collect coins and feed your Fuzzite.

More to come: 
You can play mini games to earn collectables and new Fuzzites. Each mini game takes one leaf of energy to play. Feed your Fuzzite food to gain an energy leaf. 

Planned Features
  • Naming 
  • Unique Patterns
  • More Items & Collectables
  • Fuzzite Breeding

(This game is currently in-development.)

Created for the 2020 🍂 Great Harvest Game Jam 🍂
